  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(GamePanel gp)
      Constructs a new Character
      Parameters:
      gp - The GamePanel where the character is created on

  • Method Details

    • setAction

      public void setAction()
      Sets the enemy / ghost action, implemented in the enemy class

    • checkCollision

      public void checkCollision()
      Checks for collisions with tiles, objects, and other characters. Adjusts character state based on collisions detected.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the character's state.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the character to the parameter Graphics2D.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics2d object to render the character's image onto the game

    • setup

      public BufferedImage setup(String imageName)
      Loads and scales character images from resources.
      Parameters:
      imageName - The name of the image to load.
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage of the loaded and scaled image.

    • searchPath

      public void searchPath(int goalCol, int goalRow)
      Determines the path for the character to follow towards a specified goal.
      Parameters:
      goalCol - The column of the goal location.
      goalRow - The row of the goal location.
